derivation: middle voice of a primary verb (perhaps rather from G5495 (χράομαι), to handle);
strongs_def: to furnish what is needed; (give an oracle, "graze" (touch slightly), light upon, etc.), i.e. (by implication) to employ or (by extension) to act towards one in a given manner
outline:
1. to receive a loan
  2. borrow
  3. to take for one's use, to use
    1. to make use of a thing
